answers.answer: From what I understand its perfectly fine and safe!! My baby is safe n healthy and we do that too :-)
I heard its actually good for baby, which would make sense cuz that's how we all got pregnant to begin with! Lol
@ShellyLette I heard the same thing! it like makes your body accommodate baby better or something lol. i heard any type of "ingesting" of the semen while pregnant is good haha.
ingesting semen while pregnant has proven to significantly reduce chances of preeclampsia lol
lmao! yes!! that's what i read! hubby was ALL OVER that one lol

Sorry, this is my first time being this far a long in a pregnancy so that one just kind of made me think. I don't know many, or any other guys at all that can do that! It's kind of weird. Lol so sorry if it was a dumb question.

it wasn't a dumb question. i think all first time mom's freak out about everything! haha during the early weeks, like from 5-9 weeks, me nd hubby stopped having sex altogether cuz i was convinced he would make me miscarry lmao.

Studies have shown that Sex in pregnancy is wonderful! You can continue to have sex as far into pregnancy, right up until birth, as you and your partner are comfortable. This includes orgasms.as long as you are comfortable its fine how long he can carry on and how long you can take it.. Just look for warning signs such as very painful contractions, unusual vaginal bleeding and uterine cramping lasting more than an hour.other than that its perfectly safe and good for healthy relationship as well.. as it will help you ease up on frustration and stress.. :)...
Yup its perfectly fine lol. Doc told me as long as it was comfortable for me, sex is fine up until my due date. But I haven't ever met a guy that can do that either lol wow

question: I was curious if it was safe for a guy to *** inside you multiple times during one session of sex while pregnant?My bf can *** then keep going then *** again and keep going for over an hour. LolIs that safe for the baby?Oh please No mean or judgmental comments.If you do have a comments please keep it in your head. Thank you.
title: tmi question....
